title: How to Test if Fabric Is Linen

steps.title: Moisten the end of a finger with water.
steps.content: Moisten the end of a finger with water. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Place this finger onto the fabric and press.
steps.content: Place this finger onto the fabric and press. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Check the other side straight away.
steps.content: Check the other side straight away. If the moisture comes through the fabric immediately, it's linen. If the moisture is slower to come through, it'll be another fabric. [3] X Research source
